BioNERO 0.1.0
  • Get started

BioNERO

Installation

You can download the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("almeidasilvaf/BioNERO")

Overview

This package includes functions to preprocess gene expression data and reconstruct and analyze biological networks (coexpression, protein-protein interaction and gene-regulatory).
